page.title: 02Marldon-Shops.
page.content: At the bottom of Vicarage Hill are two small village{shops}. The Bungalow stores sells mainly fruit vegetables and basic provisions.Although most people take the goods they need from the shelves,the fresh food is only handled by the shopkeeper.The store is run by the owners,who stay open every day of the week from 8.30 a.m. until 6.30 p.m. The Castle shop is a newsagents and confectioners which also sells ice cream,soft drinks gifts and toiletries.The shop is open everyday from 6.30 a.m.to sell newspapers until 7.00 p.m. In the windows are many notices of things that people want to buy and sell.The shop also acts as an agency for a firm of dry cleaners. Outside are plants, compost and garden furniture for sale.
